title: AI Co-Development
description: Exploring the future of human-AI collaborative development through the creation of schmitz.ai
subtitle: Building schmitz.ai with Claude
initial_vision_h1: Building a Modern Portfolio with AI
problem_body: Traditional content management systems either require backend infrastructure or sacrifice content manageability for static hosting. **The challenge:** Create a static site with dynamic content management capabilities.
approach_list:
The solution emerged through iterative AI collaboration, focusing on three key technical areas:

**1. Content Management**
*Problem:* Need easy content editing without a database
*Solution:* CSV-based content system with rich text support

**2. Image Handling**
*Problem:* Complex image path management across development and production
*Solution:* Automated path resolution system

**3. Build Process**
*Problem:* Converting content for static hosting
*Solution:* Automated build pipeline
architecture_body: Created CSV templates for structured content management;Developed custom CSV to JSON converter with rich text parsing;Implemented automated image path resolution;Built React components with error handling;Established deterministic build process for GitHub Pages
innovation_body:
**1. Content Management System**
• CSV files for easy content editing
• Rich text formatting support
• Structured content validation
• Automated JSON conversion

**2. Image Management**
• Automatic path resolution
• Development/production path handling
• Robust error checking
• Fallback handling

**3. Build Pipeline**
• CSV validation
• JSON generation
• Image path mapping
• Static file optimization
collaboration_body: The system uses a **three-tier content architecture**: 1. *Content Layer (CSV)* • Human-editable spreadsheets • Rich text formatting • Image path references • Content validation 2. *Processing Layer (Node.js)* • CSV parsing • JSON generation • Path resolution • Error checking 3. *Presentation Layer (React)* • Component rendering • Image loading • Error handling • Performance optimization
results_list:
The image management system solves several key challenges:

**Path Resolution**
```javascript
// CSV Reference
/images/example.jpg

// Development Import
../images/example.jpg

// Production Output
/static/media/example.[hash].jpg
```

**Key Innovations:**
• *Automatic path conversion*
• *Development/production consistency*
• *Webpack integration*
• *Error recovery*
